data.text: @prnchynjn okay yanii thank you for the insight 😚
@hyuniret8 i see~ alright babe thanks for the insight!
@jeonginfoxxy but for me i dont think everyday is needed. just a few days after last contact & a few days after quarantine pun okay 👍🏻

@jeonginfoxxy from my experience, it's my 4th time quarantine now, better get tested after a few days from last contact since the kit only detect when on contagious phase. no need to do it frequently but if u want to, go ahead. usually ppl got tested in the middle/at the end so monitor ur body
@jeonginfoxxy Not everyday for what i go through. Dalam next 2 days pulak cmtu sbb by saliva test ni dia detect lambat and yes kna keep buat test the next few days cmtu
day of self-quarantine even without symptoms. i got my booster shot but i donâ€™t want to take the risk of spreading the virus without me knowing 😭
